General.Name: Bintai Kinden Corporation Bhd
General.Description: Bintai Kinden Corporation Berhad, an investment holding company, provides specialized mechanical and electrical engineering services in South-East Asia, China, and the Arabian Gulf region. The company operates through Specialized Mechanical and Electrical Engineering; Concession Arrangements; and Investment Holdings and Others segments. It also engages in the construction and property development, and development of residential properties. In addition, the company trades in building materials; constructs power plants and transmission towers and lines, as well as switching yards; and undertakes turnkey, infrastructure, and civil and structural construction projects, as well as environment and facilities management. Further, it provides concession arrangements in the construction and maintenance of facilities and infrastructure; and property management services. Additionally, the company is involved in the provision of medical supplies and management; operating business relating to wellness programs; provision of services in relation to the biotech industry; design, manufacture, and installation of customized hospital support system equipment, as well as provides nursing homes services; and provision of services in relation to renewal energy system. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
